channel.title: How to change words in where u talk
channel.description:
like i wanna no how to change the things how it says like when u log in
admins: admin, billysmither pmods: blaa blaa
plz tell me how and il give u suprise

item.title: How to change words in where u talk
item.dc:creator: @ozzygold ozzygold
item.description:
@ozzygold wrote:

thx m8 that helped alot but i need were u type in words like were peoples words show because it says welcome to testscape
admins: admin, nv i sible

item.title: How to change words in where u talk
item.dc:creator: @p_k_j00 p k j00
item.description:
@p_k_j00 wrote:

wot source you using?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 07, 2006, 03:33:55 AM[/size][hr]iâ€™m guessing your using testscape. so,

find.

public void MainHelpMenu

then you will see

sendQuest("@dre@Main Help Menu", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to Testscape", 8145); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Made by P K J00@dbl@", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ No Website yet @dbl@", 8148); sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @gre@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @dre@ days ago.@dbl@", 8149); sendQuest("@dbl@ A few commands", 8150); sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::yell@dre@ Tells everyone a message you send.@dbl@", 8151); sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::fish2@dre@ Another place for high lvl fishers.@dbl@", 8152); sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::fish@dre@ This takes you to Varrock to fish at the Fountain.@dbl@", 8153); sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::startmine1@dre@ Takes you to mining start spot 1.@dbl@",8154); sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::players@dre@ This tells you how many people are playing.@dbl@", 8155); sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::mypos@dre@ This tells you your current location.@dbl@", 8156); sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::empty@dre@ Clears items from your backpack.@dbl@", 8157); sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::pass@dre@ Sets a new password for your account.@dbl@", 8158);

then all you do is change the text inside the " ".

for example:-

sendQuest("Welcome to myscape", 8145); sendQuest("Admins:", 8145); sendQuest("billysmither", 8145); sendQuest("mods", 8145); sendQuest("blah blah blah", 8145);

Read full topic
